column1: 都民経済計算年報 令和３年度 Annual Report on Tokyo Metropolitan Accounts for 2021
４　関連指標  ４　Related Indicators
(1)　都民経済計算関連指標  (1) Related Indicators for Prefectural Accounts
注１）人口は、「東京都の人口（推計）」（都総務局統計部）より引用    Note1: Population data from “Estimated Population of Tokyo” by Statistics Division， Bureau of General Affairs， Tokyo Metropolitan Government
注２）一人当たり所得水準等の計算式        Note2: Prefectural income per capita， etc. are calculated as follows:
・都民一人当たり都民所得（名目）＝都民所得（名目）÷都総人口           Prefectural income per capita (at current prices) =Prefectural income (at current prices)÷Total population of Tokyo

・都民一人当たり家計最終消費支出（名目）＝家計最終消費支出（名目）÷都総人口           Prefectural final consumption expenditure of households per capita (at current prices) =Prefectural final consumption expenditure of households (at current prices)÷Total population of Tokyo

・都民一人当たり家計最終消費支出（実質：連鎖方式）＝家計最終消費支出（実質：連鎖方式）÷都総人口           Prefectural final consumption expenditure of households per capita (real: chain-linked) =Prefectural final consumption expenditure of households (real: chain-linked)÷Total population of Tokyo

・雇用者一人当たり都民雇用者報酬（名目）＝都民雇用者報酬（名目）÷都民雇用者数           Prefectural compensation of employees per employee (at current prices) =Prefectural compensation of employees (at current prices)÷Number of employees living in Tokyo
Note3: “Fiscal Year” refers to the 12 months beginning from April 1 of the year stated.
